sql.ADDOCUMENT_SQL_in: select a.year,a.month,DATE_FORMAT(a.createDate,'%d'),a.comp_name,a.comp_id,a.status,a.createDate from ad_document a left join (select * from data_worktable_warning_center where isdel = 0 and model_id = parameter1 and page_author = parameter2 and status in (parameter3) ) b on a.createDate= b.createDate where 1=1 and a.`status` in ( parameter3 ) and a.isdel=0 and b.org is null and STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(a.`year`,a.`month`),'%Y%m') < parameter4
sql.ADDOCUMENT_SQL_out: select b.* from ad_document a left join (select * from data_worktable_warning_center where isdel = 0 and model_id = parameter1 and page_author= parameter2 ) b on a.createDate= b.createDate where b.`status`= parameter3 and a.`status`in ( parameter5 ) and a.isdel=0 and b.org=a.comp_id and STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(a.`year`,a.`month`),'%Y%m') < parameter4
sql.ADDOCUMENT_SQL_fillin: select v.vcFullName,v.nNodeID from v_organInfo v where v.nNodeID not in (select a.comp_id from ad_document a where a.year = parameter6 and a.month = parameter7 ) and v.nNodeID not in (select d.org from data_worktable_warning_center d WHERE d.year = parameter6 and d.month = parameter7 and d.model_id = parameter1 )
